title: Credit-led consumption helps companies boost sales in rural India
description: India's smaller towns and rural areas are seeing a rise in credit-driven consumption due to increased consumer financing and new bank accounts under the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana. This trend is evident in the purchase of two-wheelers, electronics, and smartphones, with finance companies expanding their reach into these markets.
